scripts.ssl: openssl genrsa -des3 -passout pass:x -out server.pass.key 2048 && openssl rsa -passin pass:x -in server.pass.key -out server.key && openssl req -new -key server.key -out server.csr && openssl x509 -req -days 365 -in server.csr -signkey server.key -out server.crt && del server.pass.key server.csr
